official_title: A bill to increase mortgage limits under homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

summary.text: Increases mortgage limits under the National Housing Act homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.

titles.title: A bill to increase mortgage limits under homeownership assistance programs administered by the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
